amendment.description: To impose sanctions with respect to the Russian Federation and to combat terrorism and illicit financing.

vote.text: Amendment SA 232 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 2. Record Vote Number: 144.

action.text: Cloture motion on amendment SA 232 withdrawn by unanimous consent in Senate.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 232 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 232 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Crapo.
